alert.note: Alert for Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 5:44PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 615 PM MST... At 544 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cutter, or 9 miles east of Globe, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cutter and Peridot. This includes AZ Route 70 between mile markers 256 and 271. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County
